ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Gangon nodded to BrightBlade and then looked under the water.. maybe there s more stuff down here.... he said..he dove under, and brought up lots of metal,

Gangon nodded to BrightBlade and then looked under the water.. "maybe
there's more stuff down here...." he said..he dove under, and brought up
lots of metal, and a glowing blue rock the size of a dinner plate....he
wiped the dirt off of it... "it looks like energon...." he said........he
set it up and went back under, he came up with another weird deveice,
without warning, it shot him between the eyes..he clutched his eyes,
dropping the weapon part and sinking under the water......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 23, 2000 8:45 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> BrightBlade, Rage
>
> * BrightBlade looked at the object that Gangon had pulled out of the
water,
> she looked at it carefully and suddenly realized that it was a device that
> she used while hot-wiring large weapons.
> She smiled at Gangon as she took it from him, it was too important to
loose!
> How could she be so irresponsible?!*
>
> " Yup! And it's really important too! It's a wiring synthesizer and lets
me
> hot-wire big weapons like auto guns in a snap."
>
>
> *BrightBlade walked a ways towards the shore so that her leg compartment
> could be exposed without being flooded with water, she placed it back in
> it's hold and then began to walk back towards the center of the lake where
> she'd been.
> She then stood for a few moments in the cold water but then took in a deep
> breath and dunked herself under the surface, she opened her optics and
> looked around the underwater world...interesting.
> She'd stay there for a bit until she was sure that she was clean, she just
> floated there in the water looking around.*
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
>
> * Rage roared as she had seen both of her prey disappear into the distance
> and over the vast spance of water that she couldn't cross, the lack of
food
> was beginning to make her weak and she was beginning to show it!
> She turned and started back towards the great metal thing that Scourge had
> led her to before, she just couldn't bare watching her dinner fly away
like
> that when her stomach growled so!*
>
